meta.title: ASUS VivoBook 15 S OLED
meta.description: Experience the brilliance of OLED technology with stunning visuals, powerful performance, and sleek design in one premium laptop.

hero.subtitle: I am ready to sell it
hero.copy: Experience the brilliance of OLED technology with stunning visuals, powerful performance, and sleek design in one premium laptop.

features.heading: Exceptional Features
features.desc: Discover the advanced technology and premium features that make the VivoBook 15 S OLED the perfect choice for creators, professionals, and enthusiasts.

cards.title: 15.6" OLED Display
cards.copy: Stunning 2.8K OLED touchscreen with 100% DCI-P3 color gamut and VESA DisplayHDR True Black 600 certification

cards.title: 1TB PCIe SSD
cards.copy: Lightning-fast 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD storage with up to 16GB for seamless multitasking

cards.title: All-Day Battery
cards.copy: Up to 9 hours of battery life with 90W fast charging - get 60% charge in just 49 minutes

spec.heading: Technical Specifications
spec.desc: Powerful hardware designed for modern computing demands

gallery.heading: VivoBook 15 S OLED Gallery
gallery.desc: Explore every detail of the VivoBook 15 S OLED from multiple angles and see the premium design and craftsmanship up close.

cta.heading: Ready to Experience OLED Excellence?
cta.copy: Join thousands of satisfied customers who've upgraded to the VivoBook 15 S OLED. Premium performance, stunning visuals, and reliable build quality in one exceptional laptop.
